text: iency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of anhidrotic ectodermal dysplasia with immune deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Anhidrotic ectodermal dysplasia with immune deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia with immune deficiency  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Immunodeficiency Disorders   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy
